config.trashslot.allowDeletionWhileTrash: [待翻译] Allow Deletion While TrashSlot is Invisible
[待翻译] Not recommended, but this will allow you to use the keybinds for deleting items even if the trash slot itself is hidden.
config.trashslot.deletionDenyList.toolti: [待翻译] List of items that cannot be deleted, in comma-separated format of "modid:name".
config.trashslot.enableDeleteKeysInCreat: [待翻译] Set to true if you want the delete keybindings to work in creative as well. Note: Items will be deleted permanently in creative, regardless of instantDeletion setting!
config.trashslot.enableHints.tooltip: [待翻译] TrashSlot will show a hint the first time the trash slot is toggled off or can be enabled on a supported screen. Set to false to disable.
config.trashslot.instantDeletion.tooltip: [待翻译] This causes the deletion slot to delete items instantly, similar to Creative Mode.
trashslot.hint.locked: [待翻译] Trash slot locked. Press %s to unlock it.
trashslot.hint.toggleOn: [待翻译] Press %s to enable the trash slot for this screen!
trashslot.hint.toggledOff: [待翻译] You've toggled off the trash slot! Press %s to re-enable it.
trashslot.hint.unlocked: [待翻译] Trash slot unlocked. Press %s to lock it.
